channel.title: Animal Cruelty in Turkey?!?!?!? VIDEOS OF PROOF!
channel.description:
Ok, I guess I got a bit too overheated the firsst time I posted this
Heres the video:
http://www.gopetition.com/petitions/stop-animal-cruelty-in-turkey.html
EDIT: Some people are really fucked in the head.
_____________________________
I also found this:
Background (Preamble): Three students have been arrested for an attack on a sheep that the local SPCA described as "one of the worst animal cruelty cases it had seen" - the attackers blew the sheep's jaw off with fireworks, and attempted to set the sheep alight after kicking and opening up the sheep's stomach.
Please see link below for complete news article:- http://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/news/article.cfm?c_id=1&objectid=10567692
Whilst I realise the arrested are innocent before being proved guilty, I call on the New Zealand Ministry of Justice to impose the maximum sentence on anyone proven guilty whom served the maximum injustice on this animal.
I would invite you all to write directly to the New Zealand Ministry of Justice, Chief Justice at reception@justice.govt.nz Good luck and thank you. Updates : Teens deny killing sheep http://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/news/article.cfm?c_id=1&objectid=10568700 Petition: We the undersigned call for the maximum penalty to be imposed on the guilty perpetrators of this abominable, callous act. Also, we wish that the guilty submit some insight into their sociopathic behaviour so that future suffering might be avoided.
WHAT THE FUCK ARE THESE PEOPLE THINKING! THEY DESERVE TO GO TO HELL!
_____________________________________________________
THIS IS WHAT YOU ARE EATING:
http://www.goveg.com/factoryFarming.asp

item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

pk3r john i’ll give you a week, month max.

Lol no im not turning vegetarian I just got pissed the first time I posted this lol

Wow, 2 days

item.title: Animal Cruelty in Turkey?!?!?!? VIDEOS OF PROOF!
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:24, topic:277611”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=366499.msg2777988#msg2777988 date=1241634710]THIS IS WHAT YOU ARE EATING:

features.peta.org

How to Go Vegan

Going vegan is easier than ever before, but we are here to make it even easier—as easy as 1, 2, 3


[/quote]

No, don’t “go vegetarian”, go fucking vegan or don’t spout how vegetarians care about animals, actually just curl up in a corner and die, because to feed the massive population you’ll need lots of farmland which destroy hundreds and thousands of insects as well as animal habitats.[/quote]

Lol no im not turning vegetarian I just got pissed the first time I posted this lol

Read full topic

item.source: Animal Cruelty in Turkey?!?!?!? VIDEOS OF PROOF!

item.title: Animal Cruelty in Turkey?!?!?!? VIDEOS OF PROOF!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:19, topic:277611”][quote author=jme link=topic=366499.msg2779801#msg2779801 date=1241720923]

pk3r john, do you eat dogs?
[/quote]I believe that’s chinese food, so yes I do

i thought it was korea and the local chinese takeaway doesnt offer dog strangely…

They eat dogs in China. I know someone who was in Hong Kong and they went to a restaurant with live dogs, and you could pick which dog you want to eat. Then they kill the dog and cook it for you. The rest I don’t know but I hear they eat pigeons and cats as well.

I think I’d pay them for the meal, and bring the dog home with me.

mhm it just doesnt seem right to eat a dog[/quote]

I agree, but I don’t have a real problem with them doing it. It’s a different culture and no one is really right either way.

Interesting wiki article on dog meat http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dog_meat
I’m sure it tastes like most other meats, but I’m pretty sure the smell alone would make me sick.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

People get soo angry at this loolll. If you were making fun of Chinese, Nigerian, or French people I would agree. But this is a few guys trapping a wolf and getting it pwnd. One petition won’t get it to some guys who havn’t seen a computer in their life. How do you think the meat you eat is made anyways. Obv boomers from left 4 dead rape cows and they multiply like crazy. And chicken, well… who gives a shit.
